channel.title: !help making shops!

item.title: !help making shops!
item.dc:creator: @killa12345 killa12345
item.description:
@killa12345 wrote:

for some reason whenever i make a shop i cant trade the npc

any1 know why? -im using testscape-

here is what the files look like
